name: Professional Networking
description: Build and maintain a powerful professional network.

levels.title: Networking Basics
levels.description: Learn the value of networking and how to introduce yourself.
practices: Connect with 5 new people in your field online

levels.title: Building Relationships
levels.description: Focus on quality over quantity. Learn to conduct informational interviews.
practices: Share a helpful resource with your network
Follow up with new contacts within 24 hours

levels.title: Leveraging Your Network
levels.objective: Create opportunities for yourself and others.
levels.description: Learn to ask for referrals, find mentors, and be a connector for others.
practices: Connect two people who should know each other
Ask a contact for specific advice or a referral
Attend an industry event and follow up
